channel.title: Office Automation on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Office Automation on 0x000216

item.title: Take a Bow For The SIP Revolution
item.description: A significant change is happening in businesses of all sizes. It’s not related to politics, social issues, or processes. It’s a subtle change that most employees aren’t aware of, a change that isn’t easily noticeable and doesn’t require anyone to alter their work methods. It simply provides enhanced capabilities and cost savings. This is the SIP revolution. What is SIP, and why is it so transformative? Watch this brief introduction to find out…

item.title: Put Some Sanity Back In Your Email
item.description: Are you happy with your email? Do you have a good relationship? All the time you spend together, you’d think you’d be perfect for each other. Or maybe not. Email can feel like a burden we can’t escape. At first, it was amazing, maybe even love at first sight. But over time, it became overwhelming. Everything seemed important at the beginning, but now it’s hard to find what matters in the constant flood of messages.
